consumeResourceAmount

public boolean consumeResourceAmount(int player,
                                     Resource.Type type,
                                     int amount)
Attempts to reduce the player's amount of the given resource by an amount. If the player does not have enough of that resource, the transaction fails.

Parameters:
player -
type -
amount -
Returns:
- whether or not the player had enough of the resource
